column4: AHH! I downloaded ubuntu for my usb but clicked "open" instead of "save" now i cant find the file anywhare! any suggestions?
You can either find it in the /tmp directory (I believe, not sure) or you can just redownload it.
I would just redownload it. Wherever it was will be a place where it'll be deleted once space is needed.
Google "learn python the hard way". I've heard it's a good resource.
